subject: Organized Labor
Football
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: The executive director of the N.F.L. Players Association said that a league proposal that players should make $1 billion in concessions made no sense when revenues were at record highs.
snippet: The executive director of the N.F.L. Players Association said that a league proposal that players should make $1 billion in concessions made no sense when revenues were at record highs.
